headline: HII and C3 AI Forge Strategic Artificial Intelligence Partnership to Support US Navy Shipbuilding
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., June 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII), America’s largest military shipbuilder, and C3 AI (NYSE: AI), the Enterprise AI application software company, have announced a strategic partnership to expand digital technologies and apply artificial intelligence (AI) to accelerate shipbuilding throughput at HII’s Newport News Shipbuilding and Ingalls Shipbuilding divisions. “Increasing shipbuilding throughput is a critical priority for HII and the U.S. Navy,” HII CEO Chris K
